biotools.summary: The Marine Metagenomics Portal (MMP) hosts the marine databases MarRef, MarDB, MarFun, and SalDB. These databases provide the marine scientific community with openly accessible, comprehensive microbial genomics and metagenomics resources, including high-quality, manually curated sequences. The user-friendly web interface allows visitors to easily navigate and refine searches within the contextual databases and offers additional BLAST searches, visualizations, downloads, and workflows (via META-pipe).
